name: IT Infrastructure Subcontractor
description: Fourth-party IT services supporting business associate infrastructure
obligations: Implement same safeguards as business associate, maintain data security, report breaches

name: Network Security Vendor
description: Cybersecurity services for business associates handling PHI
obligations: Provide threat detection, maintain firewalls, implement intrusion prevention, report incidents

name: Data Center Operations
description: Facility services for data center hosting PHI systems
obligations: Maintain physical security, environmental controls, redundancy, disaster recovery

name: Backup and Recovery Service
description: Disaster recovery and business continuity services for PHI systems
obligations: Maintain secure backups, test recovery procedures, encrypt backup media, secure storage

name: Personnel Staffing Agency
description: Temporary workforce providing support to covered entities or business associates
obligations: Background check workers, train on HIPAA, maintain confidentiality agreements

name: Document Shredding Service
description: Secure destruction of physical records containing PHI
obligations: Properly destroy documents, provide certificates of destruction, maintain audit trail

name: Courier or Mail Service
description: Delivery of documents containing PHI between entities
obligations: Maintain chain of custody, secure transport, track deliveries, protect from loss/theft

name: Scanning and Digitization Service
description: Converting physical medical records to electronic format
obligations: Maintain data integrity during conversion, implement secure transmission, verify accuracy

name: Testing and Validation Consultant
description: Third-party security testing and vulnerability assessment services
obligations: Conduct authorized testing, report findings, maintain confidentiality of vulnerabilities

name: Archive and Retention Service
description: Long-term storage of historical PHI and medical records
obligations: Maintain data integrity over time, implement access controls, secure facilities
